channel.title: CVE Feed for ICS-CERT -- Beckhoff TwinCAT PLC products
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ICS-CERT -- Beckhoff TwinCAT PLC products

item.title: CVE-2018-7502|2024-08-05T06:31:04.349Z -- ics-cert -- beckhoff%20twincat%20plc%20products
item.description: Kernel drivers in Beckhoff TwinCAT 3.1 Build 4022.4, TwinCAT 2.11 R3 2259, and TwinCAT 3.1 lack proper validation of user-supplied pointer values. An attacker who is able to execute code on the target may be able to exploit this vulnerability to obtain SYSTEM privileges.
